title: will i be able to run it?
body:
I bought this laptop few days ago so guys I just want to hear ur opinions before I download the game will I be able to run league of legends on it smoothly, what settings and also fps. Ty
Laptop model: Lenovo IdeaPad 100-15IBD
Specs:
4GB DDR3 RAM
1000GB HDD
Nvidia gf920m-2GB
Intel Core i3-5005IU

replies.body: I don't have intimate knowledge of your rig, so you would know better than anyone.  We do have a [recommended requirements](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752654-Minimum-and-Recommended-System-Requirements) guide that may be able to help out though!  Hope that helps!
